languages.text: "Может вы и правда {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}предвестни{mf|к|ца} рока{/d}, как в народе говорят, и лифт сглазили? Сотни лет Вольных Торговцев на себе возил старик, но стоило вам в него ступить — тут же рухнул!"

"Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"
languages.original_text: "Может вы и правда {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}предвестни{mf|к|ца} рока{/d}, как в народе говорят, и лифт сглазили? Сотни лет Вольных Торговцев на себе возил старик, но стоило вам в него ступить — тут же рухнул!"

"Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

languages.text: "Vielleicht seid Ihr ja wirklich dieser {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Bote des Leids{/d} für den Euch die einfachen Leute halten. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr den Aufzug nicht verflucht habt? Das alte Ding transportiert seit Hunderten von Jahren Freihändler, aber dann habt Ihr ihn betreten ... und tschüss!"
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht seid Ihr ja wirklich dieser {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Bote des Leids{/d} für den Euch die einfachen Leute halten. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr den Aufzug nicht verflucht habt? Das alte Ding transportiert seit Hunderten von Jahren Freihändler, aber dann habt Ihr ihn betreten ... und tschüss!"

languages.text: « Peut-être êtes-vous vraiment {mf|le|la} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}{mf|porteur de malheurs|porteuse de malheurs}{/d} que les gens simples voient en vous. Vous êtes vraiment {mf|sûr|sûre} de ne pas avoir maudit l'ascenseur ? Cette vieillerie a transporté des libres-marchands pendant des centaines d'années, mais à peine avez-vous mis le pied à l'intérieur... qu'elle a fait le grand plongeon ! »
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être êtes-vous vraiment {mf|le|la} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}{mf|porteur de mallheurs|porteuse de malheurs}{/d} que les gens simples voient en vous. Vous êtes vraiment {mf|sûr|sûre} de ne pas avoir maudit l'ascenseur ? Cette vieillerie a transporté des libres-marchands pendant des centaines d'années, mais à peine avez-vous mis le pied à l'intérieur... qu'elle a fait le grand plongeon ! »

languages.text: «Tal vez sí sea {mf|el|la} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}portador{mf||a} de desgracias{/d} que la gente corriente cree. ¿Seguro que no ha maldito el ascensor? Lleva siglos transportando al Comerciante Independiente de turno, pero ha sido subir usted y... ¡se ha caído!».
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez sí sea {mf|el|la} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}portador{mf||a} de desgracias{/d} que la gente corriente cree. ¿Seguro que no ha maldito el ascensor? Lleva siglos transportando al Comerciante Independiente de turno, pero ha sido subir usted y... ¡se ha caído!».

languages.text: 「おそらく、あなたは本当に、素朴な連中が思い描いている{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}苦難をもたらす者{/d}なのだろう。エレベーターを呪ったんじゃないか？あの古いエレベーターは、何百年にも亘ってローグトレーダーを運んできた。だが、あなたが一歩足を踏み入れた途端…一気に落ちたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、あなたは本当に、素朴な連中が思い描いている{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}苦難をもたらす者{/d}なのだろう。エレベーターを呪ったんじゃないか？あの古いエレベーターは、何百年にも亘ってローグトレーダーを運んできた。だが、あなたが一歩足を踏み入れた途端…一気に落ちたんだ！」

languages.text: “或许，您真的就是那些头脑简单的家伙所声称的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}不祥之人{/d}吧？您确定您没有诅咒过那个电梯吗？那东西已经工作了几百年，运送了无数行商浪人，可偏偏当您走进去的时候，它就掉下去了！”
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"

traits.locale_text: “或许，您真的就是那些头脑简单的家伙所声称的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}不祥之人{/d}吧？您确定您没有诅咒过那个电梯吗？那东西已经工作了几百年，运送了无数行商浪人，可偏偏当您走进去的时候，它就掉下去了！”

languages.text: "Belki sahiden avamın sandığı gibi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}uğursuzluk getiren{/d} birisinizdir. Asansörü lanetlemediğinizden emin misiniz? Emektar asırlardır Hür Tacirleri taşırdı ama siz binince pat diye çakılıverdi!"
languages.original_text: "Maybe you really are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}bringer of woes{/d} that simple folk paint you as. Are you sure you didn't curse the elevator? That old thing transported Rogue Traders for hundreds of years, but then you stepped inside — and down it went!"
